verses: In the beginning God created the heavens and the earth.
And God said, 'Let there be light.'
Thus the heavens and the earth were completed in all their vast array.
By the seventh day, God had finished the work he had been doing.
These are the names of the sons of Israel who went to Egypt.
Now Joseph and all his brothers died.
Now a man of the tribe of Levi married a Levite woman.
She became pregnant and gave birth to a son.
The book of the generation of Jesus Christ.
Abraham begat Isaac; and Isaac begat Jacob.
Now when Jesus was born in Bethlehem of Judaea.
And being warned of God in a dream.
The beginning of the gospel of Jesus Christ.
John did baptize in the wilderness.
And again he entered into Capernaum.
And they came unto him, bringing one sick of the palsy.
Blessed is the man who walks not in the counsel of the wicked.
He is like a tree planted by streams of water.
Why do the nations rage and the peoples plot in vain?
The kings of the earth set themselves.
The proverbs of Solomon, son of David.
The fear of the Lord is the beginning of knowledge.
My son, if you accept my words.
Then you will understand the fear of the Lord.
